binge.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a short period when you do too much of something, such as eating or drinking
binge.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Ken’s gone on a binge with his mates.
binge.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to do too much of something, such as eating or drinking, in a short period of time
binge.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Whenever she’s depressed, she binges on chocolates.
